headline: SBA Communications tops third-quarter estimates, raises 2025 revenue forecast
summary: SBA Communications beat third-quarter estimates and raised its annual revenue forecast on Monday, helped by steady demand for its site leasing services from mobile network operators. The company is benefiting from increasing investments by mobile network operators to expand 5G and network capacity, driven by resilient consumer demand for connectivity, signaling steady site leasing activity for SBA. The company owns and operates wireless communications infrastructure, including tower structures, rooftops and other structures.

content.title: SBA Communications tops third-quarter estimates, raises 2025 revenue forecast

headline: Bernstein downgrades Charter as competition limits earnings growth
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein lowered its rating on Charter Communications Inc to Market-perform, saying tougher competition from wireless and fiber providers will weigh on profit growth despite stable cash generation.

content.title: Bernstein downgrades Charter as competition limits earnings growth
